title: Got Sermon?
desc: The Advent schedule for 2015: 11/5?Pamela Cooper-White ?Preparing for Advent: From Prophecy to Pregnancy?   11/12?Hal Taussig Study of the Gospel lesson for the first Sunday in Advent (Luke 21:25-36) focusing on the meaning of the "Son of Man/Child of True Humanity." And, reading of the Lukan text alongside the treatment of the "Son of Man/Child of True Humanity" in Gospel of Mary 4:1-5:10   11/19?Aliou Niang "Divine Peace and Participatory Human Agency in Phil 4:1-9" 12/3?Beth Bidlack "The Arm of God: Embodiment and Power in Our Communities" (Isaiah 52:7-10 and Psalm 98)
